name: OCGA Off-Course Golfers Association
tag_list: urban-golf, crossgolf, golf, sports, news, streetgolf, almostgolf
description: urban golf, cross golf, street golf
overview:
the Off course golf network is the first golf network that covers everything having to do with urbangolf, almostgolf, crossgolf, neighborhood golf and streetgolf.

Since the invention of the almostGolf ball, golf can now leave the golf course and spread into over 500,000 schools with playing fields. The almostGolf ball makes it possible to play ‘frisbee’ golf virtually anywhere

We cover the US and European CrossGolfers Tour for 2011 and beyond. If you want to play golf anytime, anywhere, the Off course golf network will help you.
